sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"地点，位置，场所"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: place, position, spot, situation, site, location, locality, setting, scene
means: place ： 含义广泛，最普通用词，既可指很小的地点，又可指很大很远的地方或场所。
position ： 多指物体相对于其他物体所处的位置或状态。
spot ： 指相对较小的特定地点或事物所在地。
situation ： 指物体在其周围环境中所处的位置或状态，侧重地点或场所的环境特征。
site ： 指或大或小的地方，既可指供专门用途或特定活动的地点，又可指某一事件的地址。
location ： 指某物设置的方向或地点。
locality ： 指某物所处的客观位置和周围地区。
setting ： 一般特指戏剧或小说所写的环境或场所。
scene ： 常指真实事件或虚构故事发生的地点。

sentence.Network_en: people living in the locality of the power station
sentence.Network_cn: 居住在发电站周围地区的人

sentence.Network_en: He surprised us with his knowledge of the locality.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们很惊讶他对那地方如此了解.

sentence.Network_en: This is the biggest hospital in the locality. It has 700 beds.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是本地最大的医院,该医院有七百张病床.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French localité. or late Latin localitas, from localis relating to a place (see local)

entry.tran: （某一国家或城市的小块）地区
entry.def: A locality is a small area of a country or city.

example.ex: Following the discovery of the explosives the president cancelled his visit to the locality...
example.tran: 发现炸药后，总统取消了对该地的访问。

example.ex: Details of the drinking water quality in your locality can be obtained from the public register.
example.tran: 有关当地饮用水质量的详情，可从公共登记册上获知。

sentences.sentence: "the plane crashed in the vicinity of Asheville"
"he always blames someone else in the immediate neighborhood"
"I will drop in on you the next time I am in this neck of the woods"

means.word_mean: (出事的)位置, 地区, 地点; （某人或某物存在的）地方, 地点

sentences.en: It was the locality of the crime.

jushi.chinese: 每一件物体都处在一定的位置上。

jushi.english: They moved to a locality where they were not known.
jushi.chinese: 他们搬到一个无人认识他们的地方。

jushi.english: It was the locality of the crime.
